short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super insights for your X (Twitter) activities and engagements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SuperX is a X (Twitter) analytics tool that helps you learn a lot about your activities, and catching up missing tweets from your friends with custom timeline

New features:
- Tweet scheduling
- Explore tweet inspirations
- AI features: Fact check, chat with any profile, rephrase/improve tweets

Features:
- SuperX Inbox
- View tweet replies
- View profile's best tweets
- Reply/like/retweet a tweet
- Custom timelines with list, user, and search
- Share beautiful charts and create poster, with 16 different styles
- Search with instant results and shortcuts
- Overview graphs: Activity Frequency, Activity Impressions, Activities for Tweets/Replies/Retweets, Engagement for Likes/Retweets/Replies/Bookmark
- Tweet impressions, with impression for each type of Tweets (video, photo, url, emoji, hashtag)
- Profile Followers growth
- Custom timeline: show tweets from your favorite users
- User interactions: see interactions (reply/retweet) between you and others
- Tweets/Replies table: See all of your tweets and reply to other tweets in table format
- Click an item on the Frequency graph to see activities
- Added Reply to your posts tab
- Display as sidebar
- Dark/dim/light mode
- View other profiles
- Login with Twitter/Sync

For feedback and question, please contact Twitter @hieuSSR.

Like SuperX? Leave your review. Your support is highly appreciated.
